text: Sinaamey sin Rabbiy inki Nafsik (Aadam kinnuk) sin ginek meesita, kaak kay Barra Caawa gineeh ken Nammayak maggo labhaa kee maggo Agabu Baax√¥ Bagul keenik Fixiixise, Yallay mariiy marak Yallal koo esserak woh yoh ab axcuk elle essertaanak meesitaay sinni Ramad targiqeenimik cibbarsima, diggah Yalli sin taamoomit dacayrih yaniih sin elle galtelek
